title: *Al-Hariri condoles Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques on Victims of crane fall in Grand Holy Mosque
content:
Beirut, Dhu-AlQa'dah 29, 1436,September 13, 2015,SPA --Lebanese Former Prime Minister Saad Al-Hariri has expressed his condolences to the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud on the victims of the fall of crane in the Grand Holy Mosque. 
He prayed to Allah Almighty to bless their souls, wishing the injured people a quick recovery. 
--SPA 
14:16  LOCAL TIME 11:16  GMT
